name: Zhirong for Boobs 'em up
detailed_description:
Zhirong is a new personage for the game Boobs 'em up. She has sexy body. Do you think she has more chances to make a good career as a prostitute? Do you want to try how good she would be on the street?

This DLC content is available from the game, on the room where you select personages.

Zhirong was born in Shanghai, China, to a family of pharmacologists. She and her elder brother Chase were raised by their parents.

At the age of 14, Zhirong was discovered by the wife of famous Chinese leader, which led to her being chosen for Shanghai Film Studio's Actors' Training Program. There, she was discovered by the popular director Jin Xie who chose her for his film 'Youth' as a deaf-mute girl whose senses are later restored by the army's medical team.

After graduating from high school, Chen attended Shanghai International Studies University.

Zhirong has been deeply interested in photography since she was quite young. During her second year in college, she found the opportunity to further develop this interest of hers. She became friends with several photographers and worked with them. One day, during a photo shoot, one of the models did not show up and Zhirong stepped in.

Much to her surprise, the picture went viral and she was contacted by her future agent who asked her to come to Hong Kong to sign a contract. Zhirong was working as a model for a few years until she got married. Her husband prohibited her to work and almost all her life she was a housewife. Now she is free and want to make up leeway and become a prostitute.

Help Zhirong to take her place on the street!

short_description: Zhirong is a new personage for the game Boobs 'em up
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 8 or later
  • Processor: 2 GHz processor or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX compatible video card with at least 512 VRAM
  • Storage: 1 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.5 or later
  • Processor: Intel 2 GHz processor or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible video card with at least 128 VRAM
  • Storage: 1 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 LTS (or similar, Debian-based distro)
  • Processor: 2 GHz processor or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible video card
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
